page.title: 03BURTON JOYCE-TRADE
page.content: Burton Joyce, a sizeable village,provides many shops and amenities for its population.The choice includes a supermarket,a library and a Post Office. A survey was conducted on Burton Joyce Main Street to discover how often the amenities in the village were used and why.They were all used regularly;in the supermarket's case mainly for groceries,bread and milk, while the Post Office was used to buy stationery and to pay bills;children tended to buy sweets.The Post Office's busiest day was Thursday when seven hundred pensions were collected.The library provided opportunities for borrowing books and records,reading magazines and obtaining information. Many people expressed a need for a fish & chip shop or a Chinese take-away & a cake-cum-tea shop.
